<h2><input type="text" value="Worlds Most Important Document?" readonly="true"></h2>

font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">SOLVE All the Following PROBLEMs  -> </span>&nbsp; </div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;">if a word in the text below is marked with &lt;&gt; around the word, THEN it is a word that refers to a phenomena or a category of phenomenas that are considered to be "PROBLEMS". </div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><span style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box;"><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; z-index: 1; border: 1px solid rgb(66, 66, 79); background: var(--background-color); overflow-wrap: break-word; white-space: normal; word-break: break-word;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); white-space-collapse: preserve;">SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

(1.)&nbsp;</span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-21" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing&gt; -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> 
&lt;Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / </b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions&gt; -> </b> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons -> 

Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to ->  
&lt;Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing&gt; to do any of these &lt;Body-Harming Violent Actions&gt; towards anyone) ->  

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(2.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-23" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing&gt; -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
&lt;Mind-Harming</b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception&gt; -> </b> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of ->  
&lt;Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone&gt;). 

(Make It Be So that No one and No Thing is able to succeed in Mind-Controlling anyone ever). 

</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(3.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-24" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;EVIL&gt; -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
Evil / Evilness</b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Evil-Being</b><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing -> 
</b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil, 
Nobody Wishes to Want Evil, 
Nobody Wishes to Do Evil). 


</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(4.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-25" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> 
</b><b style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> &lt;NSCS ->  </b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Not-Self-Chosen-Situations ->  InVoluntaryness / InVoluntary Situations / Not-Self-Chosen-Situations&gt; -> 
</b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  
(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(5.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-26" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING&gt; -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">InVoluntary Suffering -> </b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make Suffering Optional) -> 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All, 
Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount, 
Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(6.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-27" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;INVOLUNTARY DEATH&gt; -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make Death Optional) ->  
(Make It Be So that Death is physically Impossible to Occur) 

(Death from External Conditions ->  Dangers, Accidents) 
(Death from Internal Conditions -> Insufficient Intake and Uptake of Air, Water, Nutrition, Temperature, Pressure, Gravity) 
(Death from Internal Conditions ->  Disease, Ageing-process) 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">


<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(7.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-28" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&lt;INVOLUNTARY DYSTROPY&gt; -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">(Make Dystropy Optional) ->  (Dystropy refers to any Deviation from Perfect Health). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(224, 224, 224); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: collapse;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">(Make It Be So that all of the following physical phenomena processes are not InVoluntarely Happening to Anyone ->&nbsp;&nbsp;Death, Dystropy, Danger, Disease, Dysfunction, Disability, Destruction, Internal Body Damage, Ageing).&nbsp;<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></span><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial;"></div>

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; float: none; display: inline !important;">(8.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-29" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); (9.) </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-21" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">&lt;Dystopian Situations&gt; -> </span>
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(10.) </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-22" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">&lt;Extinction of Humanity"-Situations&gt; -> </span>
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
(11.) &lt;</span>InVoluntary Ignorance&gt; ->  
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(12.) &lt;</span>InSufficient Moral Enlightenment&gt; ->  
</span></div></span><p></p><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
</span></p><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><div class="sentence" style="box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; border-radius: 10px; position: relative; text-align: left; padding: 1em 2em; margin: 1em 0px; max-width: 100%; width: auto; color: rgb(224, 224, 224); outline: none; cursor: text; z-index: 1; border: 1px solid rgb(66, 66, 79); background: var(--background-color); overflow-wrap: break-word; white-space: normal; word-break: break-word;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-22" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

(1.)&nbsp;</span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-21" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">VIOLENCE / BODY-HARMing -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> 
Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / </b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions -> </b> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons -> 

Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to ->  
Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) ->  

(Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these types of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(2.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-23" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">PSYOPS / MIND-HARMing -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
Mind-Harming</b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Mind-Control / Psyops / Manipulation / Indoctrination / Deception -> </b> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible for AnyOne or AnyThing to Suceed with the Attempted ActionDoingActivitys of ->  
Mind-Harming someone, MindControlling someone, Manipulating someone, Indoctrinating someone, Psyopsing someone, Deceiveing someone, Bullying someone). 

(Make It Be So that No one and No Thing is able to succeed in Mind-Controlling anyone ever). 

</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(3.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-24" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">EVIL -> </span>&nbsp;<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
Evil / Evilness</b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Evil-Being</b><b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> / Evil-Wanting / Evil-Doing -> 
</b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make It Be So that Nobody Chooses to Continue to Be Evil, 
Nobody Wishes to Want Evil, 
Nobody Wishes to Do Evil). 


</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(4.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-25" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> </span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> 
</b><b style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> NSCS ->  </b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Not-Self-Chosen-Situations ->  InVoluntaryness / InVoluntary Situations / Not-Self-Chosen-Situations -> 
</b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  
(Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(5.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-26" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">INVOLUNTARY SUFFERING -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><b style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">InVoluntary Suffering -> </b><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make Suffering Optional) -> 
(Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All, 
Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount, 
Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(6.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-27" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">INVOLUNTARY DEATH -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">
(Make Death Optional) ->  
(Make It Be So that Death is physically Impossible to Occur) 

(Death from External Conditions ->  Dangers, Accidents) 
(Death from Internal Conditions -> Insufficient Intake and Uptake of Air, Water, Nutrition, Temperature, Pressure, Gravity) 
(Death from Internal Conditions ->  Disease, Ageing-process) 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(7.)</span> </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-28" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1; font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">INVOLUNTARY DYSTROPY -> </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"> 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">(Make Dystropy Optional) ->  (Dystropy refers to any Deviation from Perfect Health). 
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; color: var(--text-color);"> <span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; (9.) </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-21" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">Dystopian Situations -> </span>
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(10.) </span><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-22" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">"Extinction of Humanity"-Situations -> </span>



<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(11.) </span>InVoluntary Ignorance ->  
<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(12.) </span>InSufficient Moral Enlightenment ->  

<span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">(13.) </span>Private Property ->  
</span></div></span><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"></p><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;">
<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></span></p><p style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"></span></p><div class="sentence" style="box-sizing: border-box; <span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-20" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions -></span>&nbsp;  

(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons ->  Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to ->  Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these V Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) ->  (Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these tpes of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">  NSCS ->  </b></span></span></span><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Not-Self-Chosen-Situations ->  InVoluntaryness / InVoluntary Situations / Not-Self-Chosen-Situations -> </b> 
(Make It Be So that InVoluntary Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  (Make It Be So that Not-Self-Chosen-Situations No Longer Can Occur) ->  

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Suffering -> </b> 
(Make Suffering Optional) ->  (Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All, Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount, Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Death -> </b> 
(Make Death Optional). 

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-16" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">InVoluntary Dystropy -> </span>&nbsp;</b> 
(Make Dystropy Optional) ->  (Dystropy refers to any Deviation from Perfect Health).

widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Suffering ->  </b>
(Make Suffering Optional) ->  (Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All, Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount, Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Death -> </b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"> 
(Make Death Optional). </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">
</span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Dystropy -> </b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(21, 21, 25); text-decoration-thickness: initial; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial; float: none; display: inline !important;">

Achieve a Reality Situation that perfectly matches the Following Set of Descriptions ->&nbsp;<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">Zero Presence of Body-Harming, Mind-Harming, Evil-Being.<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">Zero Potentiality for Body-Harming, Mind-Harming, Evil-Being.<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">+<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">Maximum Presence of Maximally Good Options for Everyone to Choose their own way towards the Goodest Possible Life for themselves. @@</div><br class="Apple-interchange-newline" style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><div style="box-sizing: border-box; Achieve the GPO useing the GPM.<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">the GPO is an Outcome with (Zero Presence of X) &amp; (Maximum Presence of Y).<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">the GPM is a Method that (Never Adds New Negatives)<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">&amp;<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">(Generates the GPX-Solutions that are Perfectly meeting the Ideal Performance Criteria, that are Forever-Lasting, that are Scaleable to become Freely Available to Everyone, that Solves as Many Problems as is possible in One Solution Implementation)<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">+<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">(where Solutions never Increase the Presence of New Problems)+<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">(where the Solutions can be created and scaled to everyone As Fast As Physically Possible)+<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">(where the Solutions have the Maximum Probability of being Feasible and Actualizeable)+<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">the GPM is a Method that -><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">- Never Adds New Negatives. + Achieves Perfect Forever ForAll Positives.<br style="box-sizing: border-box;">- Exclusively Focuses on Technological Invention Solutions. + Never Focuses on Political, Social, Institutional Solutions. @@<br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div></div><br class="Apple-interchange-newline" style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;"></div><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box;  (where Each of the Category-Classification-Words refers to a Set of Multiple Distinct Physical Processes and/+or Physical Phenomena
</span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif;"> that can be Increased and/+or Decreased in any physically possible Reality-Situation

<section class="section" id="part2">

@</span><br class="Apple-interchange-newline"><br></div><div class="sentence"> GPX-LCO-VC-NAA-FAFE  =<br> GPX = (GOODest Possible X) =<br><br> LCO  = (Life Changeing Options) =<br> VC  = (Voluntarely Chosen) =<br><br> NAA  = (Nearly Abundant Access) =<br> FAFE  = (For All For Ever) =<br><br><br>VCP = Vol Choice POSSIBILITYs. <br>VCO = Vol Choice OPTIONs. <br> GPXA-LCO-VC-NAA-FAFE  = <br> GPXA  = (GOODest Possible X Answer(s) ) =<br> LCO  = (Life Changeing Option(s) ) =<br> VC  = (Voluntarely Chosen) =<br> OTBM = (Ought-To-Be-Made) = <br> NAA  = (Nearly Abundant Access) =<br> FAFE  = (For All For Ever) =<br><br> OTBMT  = OUGHT To Be Made True&nbsp;&nbsp;<br><br>WHAT Are the GOODest-Possible-X-ANSWER(s) to <br>LIFE-CHANGEing-OPTIONs <br>what are the GPX-Life-Changeing-Options ? <br><br>what are the GPX Voluntarely-Chooseable Life-Changeing-Options that OTBM-Ought-To-Be-Made   [ ? ]<br><br>OTBMT  = OUGHT To Be Made True =<br>OTBMR = OUGHT To Be Made Real =<br>OTBMA  = OUGHT To Be Made Actual =<br>OTBA  = OUGHT To Be ACTUALIZED =<br></div><div class="sentence">C = is a "Choice".<br>OC = is an "Optional Choice".<br>OAC = is an "Optional Available Choice".&nbsp;<br>Choice that is an Available Voluntary Option.&nbsp;</div><div class="sentence">MODULARITY of SEMANTIC-ISLANDs within CONCEPT-CONSTRUCTs.<br>CHOICE that is AVAILABLE as a VOLUNTARY OPTIONAL POSSIBLE.<br></div><div class="sentence">CPA = CHOICE POSSIBILITY ABUNDANCE.<br>CPA = Choice Possibility Abundance.<br></div><div class="sentence">Solution-Candidate.<br>Solution-Proposal.<br>Solution-Possibility.<br>Solution-Hypothesis.<br>GPX-CHOICEs that OTB made Abundantly-Available to Everyone Forever.<br>CHOICEs -><br>that are NOT-AT-ALL__BAD -><br>that are GOOD -><br>that are AS-GOOD-AS-IT-COULD-POSSIBLY-BE ->&nbsp;<br></div><div class="sentence">Accessable &amp;  = PLACEing the WORTHYest TEXT on TOP.<br> <span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-66">MELIT</span> = MOVEing ELSEWHERE the LESS IMPORTANT TEXT.<br><span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-67">IVS</span>&nbsp; = the Action of Makeing Something (A Benefit, A Set of Benefits) to become More Abundant and Less Scarce.<br>&nbsp;<span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-76">ABUNDIFYing</span>&nbsp; = the Action of Makeing Something (A Benefit, A Set of Benefits) to become More Abundant and Less Scarce.</div><div class="sentence"> &nbsp;<span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-74">BSTBI</span>&nbsp; </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">

</span></p><span style="box-sizing: border-box;"><div style="box-sizing: border-box;"><div class="sentence" style="box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; border-radius: 10px; position: relative; text-align: left; padding: 1em 2em; margin: 1em 0px; max-width: 100%; width: auto; color: rgb(224, 224, 224); outline: none; cursor: text; z-index: 1; border: 1px solid rgb(66, 66, 79); background: var(--background-color); overflow-wrap: break-word; white-space: normal; word-break: break-word;"><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">&nbsp;<span class="highlight-yellow" id="highlight-10" style="box-sizing: border-box; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgb(191, 149, 63), rgb(252, 246, 186), rgb(219, 199, 137), rgb(251, 245, 183), rgb(170, 119, 28)); border: 1.5px solid rgb(205, 178, 122); border-radius: 3px; position: relative; font-weight: bold; padding: 1px 4px; color: black; z-index: -1;">SOLVE All of the Following PROBLEMs</span>&nbsp; ->  

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;"> Body-Harming / Physical Attack Harming / Violence / </b></span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Physical Violence / Violent Attack Actions -> </b> 
(Make It Be So that it is physically Impossible to to do Body-Harming Violent Actions to Other Persons ->  Violent Actions includes but is not ncessarily limited to ->  Murder, Torture, Rape, Slavery, Imprisonment, Kidnapping, Endangerment, Slavery, and Threat-Makeing to do any of these V Body-Harming Violent Actions towards anyone) ->  (Make It Be So that No one and No thing can do these tpes of Action-Doing-Processes to anyone ever). </span><span style="box-sizing: border-box; color: var(--text-color); font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br style="box-sizing: border-box;">

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">  NSCS ->  </b></span></span></span><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">Not-Self-Chosen-Situations ->  InVoluntaryness / InVoluntary Situations / Not-Self-Chosen-Situations -> </b>

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Suffering -> </b> 
(Make Suffering Optional) ->  (Make It Be So that Anyone can Choose to Not Suffer At All, Choose to Reduce any specific Type of Suffering by any specific Amount, Choose to PreSelect a Default-Mode of Not Experienceing specific types of Suffering in specific Amounts in response to Externally Originating Stimuli and Internally Originating Stimuli). 

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Death -> </b> 
(Make Death Optional). 

<b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Dystropy -> </b> 
(Make Dystropy Optional) ->  (Dystropy refers to any Deviation from Perfect Health).

</span><br class="Apple-interchange-newline" style="box-sizing: border-box;"><b style="box-sizing: border-box;">InVoluntary Poverty -> </b>
